title: Fireblossom Seeds
summaries: Fireblossom Seeds are a type of seed that can be obtained from harvesting Fireblossoms while they are blooming or using the Staff of Regrowth on naturally grown Fireblossoms while they are fully grown. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, a Fireblossom will bloom when the sun is setting if it is not raining, from 3:45 PM to 7:30 PM. On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, Fireblossom plants must be at least partially submerged in lava before they will bloom and yield seeds. Each plant will drop 1–3 Fireblossom Seeds when harvested while blooming.

Fireblossom Seeds can be placed on Ash Blocks, empty Clay Pots, or any types of Planter Boxes, even inside lava, and will grow into harvestable Fireblossoms. They will grow anywhere, not just in the Underworld, but will only yield seeds when blooming.
Like the Fireblossom, this item is not destroyed when coming into contact with lava, despite having a rarity of 00*[img:Rarity level: 0].
